methods.name: MuslimWorldLeague
methods.description: Muslim World League (MWL) method, usually used in Europe, Far East, and parts of America. Default in most calculators.

methods.name: Egyptian
methods.description: Egyptian General Authority of Survey method, commonly used in Egypt.

methods.name: Karachi
methods.description: University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi method, widely used in Karachi, Pakistan.

methods.name: UmmAlQura
methods.description: Umm al-Qura University, Makkah method, utilized in Makkah, Saudi Arabia.

methods.name: Dubai
methods.description: Dubai method, specific to Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

methods.name: MoonsightingCommittee
methods.description: Moonsighting Committee method, based on moonsighting observations.

methods.name: NorthAmerica
methods.description: Islamic Society of North America (ISNA) method, commonly used in North America.

methods.name: Kuwait
methods.description: Kuwait method, commonly used in Kuwait.

methods.name: Other
methods.description: Other or generic calculation method with no specific parameters.

latitudes.name: MiddleOfTheNight
latitudes.description: Fajr will never be earlier than the middle of the night and Isha will never be later than the middle of the night

latitudes.name: SeventhOfTheNight
latitudes.description: Fajr will never be earlier than the beginning of the last seventh of the night and Isha will never be later than the end of the first seventh of the night

latitudes.name: TwilightAngle
latitudes.description: Similar to SeventhOfTheNight, but instead of 1/7, the fraction of the night used is fajrAngle/60 and ishaAngle/60
